name: Joined Together (Skillerabren)
description:
Hi 👋
This is my Submission to the GMTK Game Jam of 2021 with the Theme "Joined Together". Your goal is to make your way through the misty world and eventually join/merge the two players together!

Thanks for playing!

Controls:
ASWD or Arrows - Move
(Tab - Switch Camera)

Join my Discord!
